monitoringBlacklistDesc.message: This site "$1" is detected as suspicious by Uppsala Security, which may carry out illicit activities not limited to installing malware on your machine, impersonation to collect Personal Identifiable Information (PII), and cryptojacking without consent. Please proceed with care.
